Case title: Kalyani (Dead) through LRS. & Ors. vs. The Sultan Bathery Municipality & Ors.
Parties involved: Kalyani (Dead) through LRS. & Ors., The Sultan Bathery Municipality & Ors.
Outcome: Appeal allowed. Judgment and order of the Division Bench of the High Court of Kerala dated 12.09.2018 in W.A. No. 2108 of 2016 is set aside and that of the Single Judge dated 26.08.2016 passed in WP(C) No. 2329 of 2014 is maintained.
